card.name: Serafhin's Timekeeper
card.text: Serafhin’s Timekeeper enters tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color, spend this mana only to cast instant or sorcery spells. {3},{T}, Sacrifice Serafhin’s Timekeeper: Draw two cards. Activate only if you’ve cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.

card.name: Stations Guide
card.text: When Stations Guide enters, you may search your library for a basic land card or Station card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Hebika Prowler
card.text: 2B/G: Sacrifice another creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature’s toughness. Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Archery Club Member
card.text: Discipline (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) This creature has first strike as long as it’s your turn.

card.name: Blastbreath Elder
card.text: Menace, prowess Whenever Blastbreath Elder becomes the target of a spell you control for the first time each turn, other creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Flame-Touched Traveller
card.text: Affinity for Stations (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Station you control.) Haste Whenever Flame-Touched Traveller dies, it deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Reckless Revelries
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Reckless Revelries, you may conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library, if you do it costs {2} less to cast. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”) Reckless Revelries deals 5 damage to any nonplayer target.

card.name: Honor-Worn Harisen
Battle Spirit
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Just as Taught
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain trample and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Soul Spite
card.text: Choose one — • Soul Spite deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. • Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Ardent Novelist
card.text: When Ardent Novelist enters, you may pay 2R/G. If you do, put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, it gains trample and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Rebellious Maiko
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value 4 or greater, up to one [target creature gets +1/+2 and gains reach until end of turn, untap it.] Paradigm shift {G} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for {G})

card.name: Regal Instructor
card.text: When Regal Instructor enters, you may conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token with “Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.” (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Hellraisers Seraph
card.text: Flying When Hellraisers Seraph enters, [creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.] Paradigm shift {W} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for {W})

card.name: Hitori's Fragmentation
card.text: Choose one — • Hitori’s Fragmentation deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Settle Beyond Reality
card.text: Choose one or both — • Exile target creature you don’t control. • Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control.

card.name: Binding Prank
card.text: Binding Prank has flash as long as you control a Student. Enchant nonland permanent Enchanted permanent can’t attack, block, or crew Vehicles. Its activated abilities can’t be activated unless they’re mana abilities.

card.name: Reminisce History
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may conjure a card named Fatigue on the top of your library. If you do, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”) Exile target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Slip on the Mask
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Constructed Companion
card.text: Reach When Constructed Companion enters, [create a 1/1 white and black Student creature token.] Paradigm shift {G} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for {G})

card.name: Taraikyo Scribe
card.text: Trample Whenever Taraikyo Scribe becomes the target of a spell you control, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Biology Professor
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {T}: Add CG, spend this mana only to pay for alternate casting costs.

card.name: Monastery Trainee
card.text: When Monastery Trainee enters you may pay 1W/U, if you do, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token with “Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.”

card.name: Greater Toad Sage
card.text: Discipline (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Trample

card.name: Senzao Ascetic
card.text: When Senzao Ascetic enters, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Put that card in your hand and the rest in your graveyard

card.name: Hebika Assailant
card.text: Reach Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Hebika Assailant. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Peaceful Tanuki
card.text: When Peaceful Tanuki enters, Choose one — • [Destroy target artifact or enchantment.] • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Paradigm shift 1G (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1G)

card.name: Light-Hearted Goading
card.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn if it’s a token, then it deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Will to Protect
card.text: Up to one target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn. If you have a card named Fatigue in your graveyard, it gets +5/+5 instead. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Spiritual Connection
card.text: Return up to one target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Create a 1/1 white and black Student creature token.

card.name: Run the Rails
card.text: Choose one — • Search your library for a basic land card or Station card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. • If mana from a Station was spent to cast Run the Rails, target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control.

card.name: Traveller's Insight
card.text: Affinity for Stations (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Station you control.) Draw two cards.

card.name: Hidanko Prefect
card.text: Prowess 1U/R: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Kajiwara's Lookout
card.text: Flying, prowess When Kajiwara’s Lookout dies, [Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.] Paradigm shift 1B (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1B)

card.name: Vengeful Apparition
card.text: When Vengeful Apparition enters, [destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.] Paradigm shift {B} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for {B})

card.name: Station Wraith
card.text: Affinity for Stations (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Station you control.) Deathtouch When Station Wraith enters, each opponent discards a card, for each opponent who can’t, you draw a card.

card.name: Fragment of Fury
card.text: Menace 3B: Return Fragment of Fury from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped with two +1/+1 counters and a finality counter on it.

card.name: Dragon's Bargain
card.text: Choose one — • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. Conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Dread Their Return
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control, then you may put two +1/+1 counters on it, if you do, conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library.” (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Coerced Betrayal
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Create a 1/1 white and black Student creature token.

card.name: Void-Fettered Monstrosity
card.text: When Void-Fettered Monstrosity enters, up to two target creatures an opponent controls can’t block this turn. {1}, Discard Void-Fettered Monstrosity: Search your library for a basic Swamp, Mountain or Forest, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Hidanko Instructor
card.text: When Hidanko Instructor enters, put a prowess counter on target creature. {1}, Discard Hidanko Instructor: Search your library for a basic Island, Swamp or Mountain, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Venerable Orochi
card.text: Trample, vigilance, lifelink {1}, Discard Venerable Orochi: Search your library for a basic Forest, Plains or Island, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Taraikyo Showstopper
card.text: Whenever Taraikyo Showstopper becomes the target of a spell you control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. {1}, Discard Taraikyo Showstopper: Search your library for a basic Mountain, Forest or Swamp, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Hidanko Swordmaster
card.text: Prowess At the beginning of combat on your turn, [target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains prowess until end of turn.] Paradigm shift {U} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for {U})

card.name: Corrupted Remnant
card.text: Whenever Corrupted Remnant dies, you may exile a card named Fatigue from your graveyard, if you do, [target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn.] (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”) Paradigm shift 1B (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1B)

card.name: Harness Your Inner Strength
card.text: Draw a card. Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 for each card you’ve drawn this turn and gains trample.

card.name: Russet Ridge Tengu
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you gain 1 life, if it’s name was Fatigue you gain 3 life instead. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Gale Drake Rider
card.text: Discipline (Whenever this creature attacks, up to one other target attacking creature gains the following abilities until end of turn.) Flying

card.name: Aoyama Renegades

card.name: Malevolent Whispers
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. It gets an additional -1/-1 until end of turn for each creature that died this turn.

card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant, sorcery and card with paradigm shift in your graveyard. Vigilance

card.text: When Seijuku Artificer enters, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Then you may pay 1W/B, if you don’t, conjure a card named Fatigue on the top of your library. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Exert Reality
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may conjure a card named Fatigue on the top of your library. If you do, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”) Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.

card.text: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. When you discard a card named Fatigue this way, untap Confounded First-Year. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)
